response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and unique features, it is worth $15,000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value while allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
